system.description:
The user may find any secret door within 20', using one charge per secret door found.

The effect will remain as long as the caster concentrates. Moving, taking damage, or failing a Saving Throw results in the concentration breaking and the effect ending.

This elegantly crafted wand is made from a shimmering silver wood, adorned with intricate carvings of ancient symbols. Its tip glows faintly with a soft, ethereal light, pulsating gently as if alive. When held, the wand seems to hum with a subtle energy, guiding its wielder with an intuitive warmth. A delicate crystal embedded in the handle refracts light in mesmerizing patterns, hinting at its hidden abilities.
system.unidentifiedDesc: A slim, smoothly finished stick about 18" (45 cm) long, the wand fits comfortably in one hand. Its surface shows faint runes and hairline veins; one end tapers to a rounded tip while the other terminates in a small carved motif. It feels surprisingly light and balanced.
